summary: Necromancers Living area & followers and dungeon
descriptionHtml:
Location : Hall of the Dead (At the side of the hall) whiterun 

Necromancers Hollow Version 1.2 Player home 

Recommend Class Type for mod:Class: Necromancer 
******************************************************************* 
The living space has two parts to it the roof and a interior cell for sleeping and additional storage 
space for your char,you can access the roof of the hall by the stone steps at the side and the inside
area by the door at the bottom of the steps.On the roof is some supplies like spell books,soul gems 
and some gold,there is also a custom spell with other supplies inside a strongbox as well as a 
storage chest & crafting tables.The interior cell has a bed,wardrobes and static decorations with 
2 teleports one to the sanctuary (Dungeon) and the other to the black crypt summoning altar. 
The sanctuary has various low level followers,teleports & vendor with a large dungeon and the 
crypt has a sumomming forge where you can cast legendry followers with the correct items. 

features 
*********** 
Teleport system around skyrim & living space 
Summoning forge to cast followers (legendry) 
Low level followers in sanctuary LVL 10,15,25 
Sanctuary Vendor selling Spells,Staffs,Robes & Soul Gems 
(Vendor has 4 Unique custom staffs) 
Necromancers Living space & Rooftop space. 
Staff,Robe & Conjuration spell for your starter necromancer char. 
Dungeon (Entrance hole in the wall next to sanctuary statue) 
Robes (6 Enchanted) Within the dungeon 
Conjuration spells (4 Within the dungeon) 
Robes : (Enchanted) various effects from fire,frost,poison,shock & conjuration. 
Spells : Conjure Dragon priest (Nerfed so not overpowered) 
Spells: Conjure Evil Jester (Duel weilding cicero & casts various spells) 
Spells : Conjure Orc Warhammer (Bezerker orc) 
Spells : Conjure Vampire Thrall (Vampire Spellblade & Casts Vampire Drain) 

Credits Update V1.1

without his help the update would not have been as good,thank you

Thanks for looking...
author: EvilMrPumpkinsNexus
